author: J. Edward Moreno
title: Five dead after attending March basketball tournament amid virus outbreak
description: Five people who attended a March high school basketball tournament in Indiana died of COVID-19, ...
content:
Five people who attended a March high school basketball tournament in Indiana died of COVID-19, USA Today reported Saturday.
On March 6, over 2,800 fans filled Lawrence Central High School in Indianapolis for the sectional semifinals.
That morning, Indiana … [+1235 chars]
